title: 'HARMFUL CHEMICALS Added'
body: 'The product description says "chemical free" and "Natural Made: The shampoo is made from natural ingredients and is devoid of synthetic preservatives & artificial colours" BUT ingredients have "sodium laureth sulphate"(SLES)
column7: "Fragrance and colour" which are known harmful chemicals. This is misleading and false advertising Product images do not have a photo of the back side and doesn\'t even mention these harmful chemicals anywhere in the description.'
